short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A job application assistant to help you apply for jobs faster.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What's the worst part about searching for jobs? ü§î
Not knowing when the job hunt will actually END. üèÅ

SidekicAI helps you generate cover letters faster during your job hunt. Input your existing cover letter and a few skills and generate an AI modified cover letter for each job you're applying to. All SidekicAI needs is the job description of the new job.

Let's face it. SidekicAI is the helping hand you need to find the job you want.
